title: Citizen Ashe
statement: Directors Rex Miller and Sam Pollard explore the enduring legacy of tennis legend and humanitarian Arthur Ashe in [CITIZEN ASHE](http://www.magpictures.com/citizenashe/), an elegant and poignant feature documentary. The film charts Asheâ€™s personal evolution from Grand Slam champion to global activist against a tumultuous backdrop that included the civil rights movement, South African apartheid, and the AIDS epidemic. Citizen Ashe premiered at the 2021 Telluride Film Festival, and was released by Magnolia Pictures. It's available for streaming on HBO Max.
